#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

typedef long long LL;

int main()
{
    int test;
    scanf("%d", &test);
    while(test--)
    {
        LL n;
        scanf("%lld", &n);
        LL ans=0;
        while(n>1)
        {
            ans+=(n/2);
            n=(n+1)/2;
        }
        printf("%lld\n", ans);
    }
}
